Background

David Noble says: first recorded descent on 24 Oct 1976 by Tom Williams (Springwood Bushwalking Club), Dave Noble (SUBW), Tony Haigh (KBC) and Ted Daniels (NPA). The party descended Ballrace after doing Surefire canyon (first recorded descent) the day before. After Surefire they climbed onto the plateau to visit a canyon that Ted Daniels knew about. Named after the level of water in one of the sections of canyon. (Kameruka Magazine Vol 15 No 1 - Sept 77)

Published by David Noble in his "Wolgan Canyons Sketch Map" of 1988.
